name: Compliance
description: Degree to which the system complies with relevant regulations and industry standards.

values.name: Exceeds Requirements
values.description: System exceeds regulatory requirements and sets industry best practices for compliance, with a proactive approach to adapting to new regulations.

values.name: Full Compliance
values.description: Full compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards, with a dedicated compliance team and regular audits.

values.name: Basic Understanding
values.description: Basic understanding of regulations, some ad-hoc compliance efforts, but no formal compliance program.

values.name: None
values.description: No awareness of or compliance with relevant regulations or industry standards.
